description: an American actress and author, who gained the status of ‘scream queen’ to mainstream audiences due to her roles in Halloween, The Fog, Prom Night, Terror Train, and Roadgames. Curtis also starred in cult comedy films Trading Places, A Fish Called Wanda, and True Lies.

name: Michelle Pfeiffer
quote: A character actress in a screen siren's body.
description: an American actress, singer, and producer. Her breakout performance was in Brian De Palma's crime film Scarface. She also starred in The Witches of Eastwick, Tequila Sunrise, and Dangerous Liaisons. Pfeiffer also co-starred in Tim Burton's Batman Returns as Catwoman.

name: Geena Davis
quote: If women can be either cats or dogs, then she's a Labrador retriever. She's got smarts, but they aren't going to scare anyone. There's nothing mysterious about her, but if there were, she'd make fun of it.
description: an American actress, film producer, writer, voice actress, former fashion model, and former archer. She is known for her roles in The Fly (1986), Beetlejuice (1988), Thelma & Louise (1991), A League of Their Own (1992), The Long Kiss Goodnight (1996), Stuart Little (1999).

name: Diane Lane
quote: Lane, in the most urgent performance of her career, is a revelation. The play of lust, romance, degradation, and guilt on her face is the movie's real story.
description: an American actress. Lane made her screen debut in George Roy Hill's 1979 film A Little Romance. She has since appeared in several notable films, including Unfaithful,The Outsiders, A Walk on the Moon, The Perfect Storm, Under the Tuscan Sun, Cinema Verite, and Trumbo.

name: Sally Field
quote: In her greatest roles, Sally Field has personified the strong-willed, independent woman of the American heartland.
description: an American actress and director. Field began her career on television and ventured into film with Smokey and the Bandit and later Norma Rae. Her other notable roles was in Absence of Malice and Kiss Me Goodbye, Places in the Heart and as Mrs. Gump in Forrest Gump.

name: Jennifer Jason Leigh
quote: Leigh has proven to be a one-woman portrait of the American fringe. Throughout her career, she has made a name for herself portraying helpless, damaged, or mentally unsound characters, often performing at a higher level than the material.
description: an American actress. Her film breakthrough came in Fast Times at Ridgemont High. She continued acting past her teen years, receiving critical praise for her roles in Miami Blues and Last Exit to Brooklyn. Other notable films include Backdraft, Georgia, Anomalisa, and The Hateful Eight.

name: Sean Young
quote: Tall, slender, and graceful brunette, the notoriously outspoken Blade Runner actress Sean Young is often remembered as much for her off-screen actions as for her on-screen acting.
description: an American actress. She is best known for her performances in the films Blade Runner (1982), Dune (1984), No Way Out (1987), Wall Street (1987), Cousins (1989) and Ace Ventura: Pet Detective (1994).

name: Whoopi Goldberg
quote: By virtue of her distinctive appearance and a persona that is both no-nonsense and empathic, Goldberg has emerged as one of the most recognizable celebrities of the '80s and '90s.
description: an American actress, comedian, author, and television host. She was the second black woman in the history of the Academy Awards to win an acting Oscar. She is known for her roles in The Color Purple (1985), Ghost (1990), and Sister Act (1992).

name: Nastassja Kinski
quote: She is simply ravishing, genuinely sexy and high-spirited without being painfully aggressive about it.
description: a German actress and former model who has appeared in more than 60 films in Europe and the United States. She enjoyed her worldwide breakthrough with Stay As You Are, then came to global prominence with her performance as the title character in the Roman Polanski’s Tess.

name: Kathleen Turner
quote: Though she came to prominence in the 1980s, Kathleen Turner, with her blend of raw sexuality, beauty, intelligence, and drive, could give golden age-sirens like Lana Turner and Ava Gardner a run for their money.
description: an American film and stage actress and director. Known for her distinctive husky voice, Turner has won 2 Golden Globe Awards. Turner came to fame during the 1980s, after roles in Body Heat, The Man With Two Brains, Crimes of Passion, Romancing the Stone, and Prizzi's Honor.

name: Sandra Bullock
quote: Giving new meaning to the term America's Sweetheart, Sandra Bullock won over scores of filmgoers and critics with her wholesome, exuberant portrayals of ordinary women in extraordinary circumstances.
description: an American actress, producer, and philanthropist. Her breakthrough role was in Demolition Man. She starred in several successful films including Speed, The Net, Hope Floats. Bullock achieved further success in the following decades in Miss Congeniality, The Blind Side, and Gravity.

name: Julia Roberts
quote: It's a delight to watch Roberts, with her flirtatious sparkle and undertow of melancholy, showing off her comic, dramatic and romantic chops.
description: an American actress and producer. She became a Hollywood star after headlining the romantic comedy Pretty Woman. Her other notable films include Erin Brockovich, Mystic Pizza, Steel Magnolias, Flatliners, Hook, Notting Hill, Runaway Bride, Eat Pray Love.

name: Meg Ryan
quote: Although she has also proven herself as a dramatic actress, Meg Ryan used her blonde hair, blue eyes, and effervescent personality to greatest effect in romantic comedies of the 1980s and '90s.
description: an American actress, director, and producer. Her performance in When Harry Met Sally brought her widespread attention. Ryan subsequently established herself as one of the most successful actresses in the 1990s, particularly in romantic comedy films such as Sleepless in Seattle.

name: Jennifer Aniston
quote: She's charismatic, likable, funny, and well-known because of Friends. Aniston plays Rachel Green with her great delivery and sharp comedic timing, often turning small lines into big laughs.
description: an American actress, producer, and businesswoman, who gained worldwide recognition for portraying Rachel Green on the television sitcom Friends. She has played the female protagonist in a number of comedies and romantic comedies: Bruce Almighty, Marley & Me, Horrible Bosses.

name: Nicole Kidman
quote: Kidman has become an actress who has employed her signature beauty and femininity into a pretty spectacle to subvert with emotions more often granted to leading mens roles. She’s woman presenting something deeper, darker, with a scent of blood.
description: an Australian actress, producer, and occasional singer. She went on to achieve wide recognition with leading roles in the drama Far and Away (1992), the superhero film Batman Forever (1995), the crime comedy-drama To Die For (1995), and the erotic thriller Eyes Wide Shut (1999).

name: Demi Moore
quote: Actress, tabloid fodder, provocative Vanity Fair cover piece: the husky-voiced brunette Demi Moore is nothing if not an unforgettable roadside attraction on the pop culture highway.
description: an American actress, former songwriter, and model. Her first film to become both a critical and commercial hit was About Last Night.., which established her as a Hollywood star. Her most famous films include A Few Good Men, Indecent Proposal, Disclosure, Striptease and G.I. Jane.

name: Catherine Zeta-Jones
quote: Self-effacing and energetic, both exotic and classic, Catherine Zeta-Jones gain success in her early Hollywood films predominantly because of her sex appeal, but she was later appreciated for her versatility.
description: a Welsh actress, who initially established herself in Hollywood with roles that highlighted her sex appeal such as in the action film The Mask of Zorro and the heist film Entrapment. She is known for such films as Traffic, Chicago, Intolerable Cruelty, The Terminal and No Reservations.

name: Winona Ryder
quote: One of the most successful and iconic actresses of the 1990s, saucer-eyed, porcelain-skinned Ryder has nailed the complex, layered teen roles  in cult-classic movies like Edward Scissorhands and Mermaids.
description: an American actress. One of the most successful and iconic actresses of the 1990s, her famous films include Tim Burton's Beetlejuice and Edward Scissorhands, Heathers, Mermaids, Bram Stoker's Dracula, The Age of Innocence, Alien Resurrection and Netflix series Stranger Things.

name: Angelina Jolie
quote: Jolie is emerging as one of the great wild spirits of current movies, a loose cannon who somehow has deadly aim. Next to Liv Tyler, Angelina Jolie is the only actress of her generation who can thank her famous father for the lips that have become her trademark.
description: an American actress, filmmaker, and humanitarian. She is known for her roles in the Girl, Interrupted, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider, Mr. & Mrs. Smith, Wanted, Salt, A Mighty Heart, Changeling and Maleficent. In the 2010s, she expanded her career into directing, screenwriting, and producing.

name: Sharon Stone
quote: Screen siren, opinionated diva, and one of the few actresses in Hollywood who can claim to be both a Paul Verhoeven muse and a MENSA member, Stone went on to become one of the most talked about actresses of the '90s.
description: an American actress, voice actress, film producer, and former fashion model. She became a sex symbol and rose to international recognition when she starred in the erotic thriller Basic Instinct. Her other films include Scorsese's Casino, The Mighty, The Muse, Sliver, Broken Flowers.

name: Kristy Swanson
quote: A cross between Lucille Ball and Linda Hamilton, Swanson's forte has been the portrayal of young ladies with prom-queen looks and room-temperature I.Q.s.
description: an American actress, best known for her portrayal of Buffy Summers in the 1992 cult film Buffy the Vampire Slayer. She appeared in movies such as Hot Shots!, The Program, The Chase, or her most critically acclaimed role, playing Kristen Connor in John Singleton's Higher Learning.

name: Kate Winslet
quote: The possessor of an hourglass-figured, full-lipped beauty that lends itself effortlessly to costume dramas, Winslet was roundly hailed by the press for standing in stark, proud contrast to her more conventional Hollywood peers.
description: an English actress. Global stardom followed soon after with her leading role in the epic romance Titanic (1997). Her other notable films include Quills, Iris, Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, Finding Neverland, The Reader and Steve Jobs.

name: Uma Thurman
quote: An actress noted as much for her exotic, almost otherworldly beauty as she is for her considerable talent, Uma Thurman is one of the most renowned actors of her generation.
description: an American actress and model. Thurman rose to international prominence with her performance in Tarantino's Pulp Fiction. She starred in several more films throughout the 1990s such as Batman & Robin (1997), Gattaca (1997), and Les Misérables (1998). She starred in Kill Bill in 2000s.

name: Pamela Anderson
quote: Bleached blonde, buxom, but slender bombshell Pamela Anderson stands out in any crowd as one of the sex symbols of the mid-'90s.
description: a Canadian American actress and model. Anderson is best known for her roles on the television series Home Improvement, Baywatch and V.I.P. after rising to fame as Playmate of the Month for Playboy magazine in February 1990.

name: Shannen Doherty
quote: The iconic Hollywood 'bad girl' of the nineties,  dark-haired actress Shannen Doherty is known for portraying conniving TV vixens.
description: an American actress, producer, and television director. She is known for her roles as Heather Duke in Heathers (1988), Brenda Walsh in Beverly Hills, 90210 (1990-1994) and as Prue Halliwell in Charmed (1998-2001).

name: Alyssa Milano
quote: From playing a scruffy tomboy on 'Who’s the Boss?,' child star Alyssa Milano has matured into a bona fide star with roles in numerous television movies and hit shows, including 'Melrose Place' and 'Charmed'.
description: an American actress, activist, producer and former singer. She is best known for her roles in Who's the Boss?, Melrose Place, Charmed, My Name is Earl, Mistresses and Wet Hot American Summer: 10 Years Later.

name: Mary-Louise Parker
quote: Mary Louise Parker has developed into the Mae Marsh of the 1990s: the eternal victim. However, unlike silent star Marsh,  poor, put-upon Parker's characters usually enjoy a satisfying 'worm has turned' moment.

name: Jessica Lange
quote: The fragile, luminous beauty of actress Jessica Lange belies the inner strength and vitality she exhibits in the characters she portrays. Though not among Hollywood's most high-profile stars, she became one of its most respected dramatic actresses.

quote: Universally known as one of the sexiest women in Hollywood, Scarlett Johansson continues to employ the gravitational pull of quiet fascination with great strange low voice and classical screen siren poses.

name: Megan Fox
quote: A slender, olive-skinned actress whose elegant beauty is somewhat offset by a collection of vivid tattoos, Megan Fox is considered one of the modern female sex symbols.

name: Jessica Alba
quote: One of the crop of bright-eyed, dewy-skinned young actors to attain teen idoldom and a regular paycheck during the late 1990s, Jessica Alba closed out the century as one of Hollywood's more promising new talents.

name: Penelope Cruz
quote: Spanish enchantress with a different kind of Latin passion than the Americanized Catherine Zeta-Jones, and a different kind of beauty. Cruz is far from a perfect beauty, but her imperfections add to her charm and interest.
description: a Spanish actress and model. Cruz achieved recognition for her lead roles in the 2001 films Vanilla Sky, All the Pretty Horses, and Blow. She was the first Spanish actress in history to receive an Academy Award for playing volatile painter María Elena in Vicky Cristina Barcelona.

name: Zooey Deschanel
quote: The intelligent, nuanced actress, Deschanel soars, combining well-honed skills with a natural charm.
description: an American actress and singer-songwriter. Deschanel became known for her deadpan comedy roles in The Good Girl (2002), The New Guy (2002), Elf (2003), The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy (2005), Failure to Launch (2006), Yes Man (2008), and (500) Days of Summer (2009).

name: Amy Adams
quote: An actress with a knack for light comedy, Adams with hugely happy eyes and pretty bright, red hair is able to exude just the right wide-eyed innocence. Her strong, determined but definitely not always positive and happy roles show Adams' true skills and versatility.

name: Rachel McAdams
quote: Possessing the sort of stylish, model-esque good looks and perhaps more important, the intensity of a great romantic lead, with a similar patrician bearing as Natalie Portman, when Rachel is at her best she's not going for the warm embrace but the cold stare.
description: a Canadian actress. McAdams rose to fame in 2004 with roles in the comedy Mean Girls and the romantic drama The Notebook. She is also known for the films Wedding Crashers, Red Eye, The Family Stone, Married Life, The Lucky Ones, Sherlock Holmes and Spotlight.

name: Kate Beckinsale
quote: The avid eyed, ruby lipped Kate Beckinsale, the rare actress whose intelligence gives her a sensual bloom. She is very effective at getting across layered character traits and emotions.

name: Reese Witherspoon
quote: As one of the most impressively talented members of the emerging New Hollywood of the early 21st century, Reese Witherspoon has proven that she can do far more than just pose winsomely for the camera.
description: An American actress, producer, and entrepreneur. Witherspoon's breakthrough role was playing Elle Woods in the 2001 film Legally Blonde. Other notable films include Sweet Home Alabama, Walk the Line, Monsters vs. Aliens, Water for Elephants, Wild, and Sing.

name: Charlize Theron
quote: The farm girl turned model turned actress with the blonde, statuesque good looks so fervently adored by the camera, Teron can disappear in a role, leaving all traces of bits and quirks behind.
description: a South African and American actress and film producer. Theron received critical acclaim for her portrayal of serial killer in Monster. She is known for starring in numerous Hollywood films, such as The Devil's Advocate, Mighty Joe Young, The Road, Prometheus, Mad Max: Fury Road.

name: Naomi Watts
quote: Watts's face metamorphoses miraculously from fresh-faced beauty to a frenzied, teary scowl of ugliness. She can play bold, independent women, and should play that more often. It's a tomboy tough, mitigated with a melodic voice.
description: an English actress and film producer. Watts came to attention in David Lynch's Mulholland Drive (2001). Her subsequent films include The Ring (2002), 21 Grams (2003), the 2005 remake of King Kong, Eastern Promises (2007), The International (2009) and The Impossible (2012).

name: Salma Hayek
quote: Widely considered to be the first Mexican actress to become a Hollywood movie star since Dolores Del Rio, Salma Hayek is known for bringing a fiery presence and striking, dark-eyed beauty to the screen.
description: a Mexican and American film actress, producer, and former model. She came to prominence with roles in movies such as Desperado (1995), From Dusk Till Dawn (1996), Dogma (1999), and Wild Wild West (1999). Her breakthrough role was in the film Frida as Mexican painter Frida Kahlo.

name: Jennifer Garner
quote: I always thought she had something in her personality that was funnier and sexier and smarter and more mischievous than anything I'd seen her do ... I wanted to show that.

name: Halle Berry
quote: Her combination of looks, talent, and tenacity propelled her from beauty pageant queen phenom to acclaimed actress. She is pretty straightforward if not stiff and usually uses really quiet voice and slow sultry moves.
description: an American actress. Her breakthrough film role was in the romantic comedy Boomerang (1992). Berry won the Oscar for Best Actress for her performance in the romantic drama Monster's Ball. Other famous films include Bulworth, X-Men film series, Swordfish and Cloud Atlas.

name: Monica Bellucci
quote: Film critics are quick to compare Monica Bellucci to previous Italian beauties, but she is her own brand of sultry icon, who has proved to be a bold blend of earthy and ethereal, actress and star.
description: an Italian actress and fashion model. Bellucci began her career as a fashion model, before making a transition to Italian films and later Hollywood films. She is perhaps best known to American audiences for her role as Persephone in The Matrix films.

name: Kate Mara
quote: Small but mighty. That’s Kate Mara, both in physical stature and acting prowess. She’s a powerful presence in the room - articulate, thoughtful and intelligent, even though she is petite.
description: an American actress. She is best known for appearing in the Netflix political drama House of Cards as Zoe Barnes and appeared in the Fox TV series 24. She appeared in Brokeback Mountain, We Are Marshall, Shooter, Stone of Destiny, The Open Road, and The Martian.

name: Audrey Tautou
quote: Earning effusive comparisons to another Audrey, sylph-like French actress Audrey Tautou became an international star with her performance as the eponymous do-gooder in Jean-Pierre Jeunet's romantic fable Amelie.
description: a French actress and model. Tautou achieved international recognition for her lead role in the 2001 film Amélie. Tautou has since appeared in films in a range of genres, including the thrillers Dirty Pretty Things and The Da Vinci Code, and the romantic Priceless.

name: Lucy Liu
quote: Once relegated to "ethnic" parts, the energetic actress is finally earning her stripes as an across-the-board leading lady.  Liu has become a household name and arguably the most famous representative of Asian women on U.S. television and film over the past decade.
description: an American actress, voice actress, director, producer, singer and artist. She became known for playing in the television series Ally McBeal. Liu's film work includes starring in Charlie's Angels, portraying O-Ren Ishii in Kill Bill and starring roles in the Payback and Chicago.

name: Milla Jovovich
quote: One known for straddling careers as a model, singer and actress, performer Milla Jovovich sported an utterly unique square-jawed look and the starkest of features that betrayed her Eastern European origins.

She starred in Besson's The Story of Joan of Arc (1999). In 2002, Jovovich starred in the science fiction horror film Resident Evil.

name: Natalie Portman
quote: Like the all-time great actresses, Portman conveys a patrician intelligence and grace, even playing a stripper. Plus, she adds an energy and sincere joie de vivre, and a dead-on delivery of every single syllable.
